longInfo:
Passport required.  
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay.

Visa required, except for Holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) and
Macao (SAR China) passports traveling as tourists. 
Minors:
- Passengers under 18 years of age leaving the Dominican
  Rep., 
Additional Information:
- Visitors must hold documents required for their next
  destination. 
- Holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) and Macao (SAR China)
  passports, traveling as tourists must buy a Tourist Card on
  arrival. Fee: USD 10.- for 30 days. Extensions possible for
  addition fees.
Warning:
- Nationals of Hong Kong (SAR China) who have visited Guinea,
  Liberia, Nigeria, Senegal or Sierra Leone within the last 30
  days will be refused entry.
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry.
 - Exempt are holders of foreign passports stating Dominican
   Rep. as place of birth.



 Dominican Rep
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis. malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year especially in rural
  areas of the western provinces such as Dajabon, Elias Pina
  and San Juan. Risk in other areas is low to negligible.
  Recommended prevention in risk areas: B.
